about.title: About Me
about.intro: Hello ! I'm Wahyudin, Full Stack Developer based in Jakarta (Indonesia). I'm a man who thirsts for curiosity and problem solvers in third of night. I am very passionate and dedicated to my work. And enjoy working in a team or individual.
about.presentation: Passionate about design and front-end web development, I am committed to carrying out the opportunities entrusted to me by building modern and effective solutions. Rigorous and demanding, I take care to respect the best practices and standards of the Web. Being also curious and open, I like to experiment with the latest trends through daily monitoring.

design.title: Visual Design
design.desc: I create the design of your websites and applications.

integration.title: Integration
integration.desc: I realize web integration of your models in Responsive Design.

development.title: Development
development.desc: I develop code with my warm hands, develop it with my heart, easy to maintain, clean code, and good practice

contact.intro: Do you have web development projects, freelance missions or just opportunities to offer me? Let's get in touch and discuss it over a coffee!
